subject: Leadership
title: Toxic Leadership
description: A fast breakdown of Toxic Leadership for builders.

hook.text: Some leaders produce results while destroying people. The numbers look great. The humans behind them don't.

buildup.text: Lipman-Blumen: toxic leadership exploits, manipulates, and undermines while maintaining an appearance of success.

discovery.text: Toxic leaders often have charisma, confidence, and political skill. That's what makes them dangerous and hard to remove.

twist.text: Organizations tolerate toxic leaders because they deliver short-term results. The cost in talent loss stays hidden.

climax.text: Track how results are achieved, not just whether they are. Exit interview data reveals toxicity the P&L statement hides.

punchline.text: A leader who delivers results but destroys people is a net loss.

quiz.question: Why do organizations tolerate toxic leaders?
options: Short-term results mask the long-term cost of talent loss
Toxic leaders are easy to identify
